mapper.select: /* CctvMapper.getCctvListTotalCnt */ SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_cctv_info A
mapper.insert: /* CctvMapper.insCctv */ INSERT INTO tb_cctv_info ( cctv_no, cctv_nm, district_no, model_nm, cctv_maker, inst_ymd, cctv_ip, web_port, rtsp_port, cctv_conn_id, cctv_conn_pwd, relay_nm, relay_ip, relay_port, maint_sts_cd, cctv_lon, cctv_lat, admin_center, partner_comp_id, partner_comp_user_nm, partner_comp_user_phone ) VALUES ( #{cctv_no}, #{cctv_nm}, #{district_no}, #{model_nm}, #{cctv_maker}, #{inst_ymd}, #{cctv_ip}, #{web_port}, #{rtsp_port}, #{cctv_conn_id}, #{cctv_conn_pwd}, #{relay_nm}, #{relay_ip}, #{relay_port}, #{maint_sts_cd}, ${cctv_lon}, ${cctv_lat}, #{admin_center}, #{partner_comp_id}, #{partner_comp_user_nm}, #{partner_comp_user_phone} )
mapper.select: /* CctvMapper.getDistrictListTotalCnt */ SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_district_info A

/* CctvMapper.getDistrictList */ SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.mod_dt IS NULL ASC, A.mod_dt DESC, A.reg_dt DESC) AS row_num ,A.district_no ,A.site_no ,A.district_nm ,A.dist_addr ,A.dist_road_addr ,A.dist_type_cd ,A.dist_abbr ,A.dist_pic ,A.dist_view_pic ,A.dist_lon ,A.dist_lat ,A.inst_comp_id1 ,A.meas_comp_id1 ,A.inst_comp_id2 ,A.meas_comp_id2 ,A.meas_str_ymd ,A.meas_end_ymd ,A.dist_offi_nm ,TO_CHAR(A.reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS reg_dt ,TO_CHAR(A.mod_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS mod_dt ,A.dist_zip FROM tb_district_info A
LIMIT ${limit} OFFSET ${offset}
/* CctvMapper.getMaintCompListTotalCnt */ SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_maintcomp_info A

/* CctvMapper.getMaintCompList */ SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.mod_dt IS NULL ASC, A.mod_dt DESC, A.reg_dt DESC) AS row_num ,A.partner_comp_id ,A.partner_comp_nm ,A.partner_type_flag ,A.partner_comp_addr ,A.comp_biz_no ,A.maint_rep_nm ,A.maint_rep_ph ,TO_CHAR(A.reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS reg_dt ,TO_CHAR(A.mod_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS mod_dt FROM tb_maintcomp_info A
LIMIT ${limit} OFFSET ${offset}

/* CctvMapper.getGenerationKey2 */ SELECT A.table_nm ,A.column_nm ,A.pre_code ,A.length ,A.max ,CONCAT(A.pre_code, RIGHT(CONCAT(REPEAT('0',LENGTH),A.max+1),LENGTH)) AS new_id FROM generation_key A WHERE 1=1 AND table_nm = #{table_nm} AND column_nm = #{column_nm}
